text: How do I export a module I created along with custom fields etc?
to a different portal ? right click "copy to portal"
Hi there does anyone know how to change the page title of a preference or an unsub page?
hi all, does anyone know why my chatbot is showing twice on this page? and how to fix it.
i can only see one chatwindow
You can also use the local development tooling to fetch the module as true files <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-development>

i'm using a Link Field and in the design manager when I try to configure the URL, I can't figure out how to enter an anchor id (i.e. #feature) so that the link will stay on the same page.  If I change Link to anything other than External, there is no option to enter a URL or text for the anchor.  Does anyone know if there is a way to get this to work?

Hi <@UMSSR1J3U>, not sure if it's the right or easiest way, but I've used a text field to take in anchor links. First I have a dropdown for content editors to select where should the button/link/CTA link to - if another page it displays the link field; if section in this page it displays the text field

thanks <@UEC4VECRG> i was doing that but it feels like a hack.  if the link field offered one more option or would allow a url that was relative and an anchor, then 1 field could handle all the navigation... i have quite a few link fields in my custom module, so its requiring me to double up on the fields and adding complexitiy to my code... thanks again

agree... is a bit of an unneeded hassle, but in my case it ended up working out better as I had to include some anti-pork-up options before the "add link/anchor" part for some standard popups to work :slightly_smiling_face:
